tool_description: Logo & brand recognition API is a combination of logo detection and logo recognition technologies. The API first detects any part of the image that looks like a logo. As a second step, it compares all detected logos to existing logo samples in an internal database, thus returning the name of the brand, if it finds a match.
name: Logo Recognition
title: Logo Recognition

api_list.name: Logo recognition from image (url)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://logo-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/logo-recognition/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logo-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://logo-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/logo-recognition/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logo-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Logo recognition from attached image file
